programme.title: Gonzo Episode 3
programme.desc: A drama that follows the struggles of black college students and their efforts to make reform on their university campus. But once there is a clash in ideology between the schoolâ€™s Black Student Organization and Gonzo, Gonzo is pressured to step up, take charge, and be the voice of the schoolâ€™s black student body.

programme.title: FIRST DATE
programme.desc: A former, female boxing champion and her business partner coach are mentoring two teenage girls, best friends through their non-profit gym.

programme.title: AFROKONS
programme.desc: Sila Apiseh, a young woman, decides to run for office. She engages in a battle to empower women and give hope to youth in her country, AFROKONS.

programme.desc: In this dramedy mini-series, 20-something Sheena is ready to move on from her small city of Alexandria, LA and head to New Orleans.

programme.title: A Legend in the Classroom: The Life Story of Ms. Yvonne Busch
programme.desc: Born in New Orleans in 1929 and raised in the historic TremĂ© section of the city, Ms. Busch, who mastered several brass instruments and the woodwinds, became a touring professional by the age of 12. Later in life, she provided the foundation for scores of New Orleansâ€™ finest musicians, who excelled in careers in jazz, R&B and gospel, by teaching them the rudiments of music.

programme.title: DARATT
programme.desc: When the government announces an amnesty for all war criminals, 16-year-old Atim's grandfather gives him a revolver and tells him to find his father's killer. The teenager loses no time in tracking him down.

programme.title: JERMAINE
programme.desc: Jermaine Johnson is a 36-year old father of three and husband to his high-school sweetheart, Lawanna.

programme.title: AN UNCOMMON WOMAN
programme.desc: Mina is tired of her husband's infidelity and decides to take a drastic decision: She takes a second husband. Based on his conversations with women involved in polygamist relationships, filmmaker Abdoulaye Dao illustrates - to very funny effects - the daily life of two persons - in this case two men - who share a spouse.

programme.title: WAVES S1 EP1
programme.desc: Nia and her sister Jean have an estranged relationship after Jean becomes close with alcohol and partying, around the same time Nia was going through a break up with her fiancĂ©. Jean now returns a year later hoping to mend the relationship with her sister. However, she has a secret that will rip their relationship apart for good.

programme.title: The Whole Gritty City
programme.desc: The documentary follows kids in three bands as the directors get them ready to perform in the Mardi Gras parades, and teach them to succeed and to survive. Through moments of setback, loss, discovery, and triumph, these children and their adult leaders reveal the power and resilience of a culture.

programme.title: Nothing But The Truth
programme.desc: Joseph, a troubled young gang member who participated in the countrywide violence is drawn to Anne and her farm seemingly in search of redemption. Both he and Anne need something that only the other can give to allow them to shed the painful memories of their past and move on â€“ but will either of them find it?

programme.title: ANGELA
programme.desc: A Cuban immigrant tries to find her place in New York City.

programme.title: A THOUSAND MIDNIGHTS
programme.desc: This experimental documentary chronicles the contemporary manifestation of the economic and social histories of Black Americans who came to the north during the Great Migration in search of economic opportunities. The implications of their migration, and the lack of economic opportunity they encountered, has far reaching consequences for Black America today.

programme.title: THE FADE
programme.desc: An observational documentary that explores the lives of four barbers across the world. Following their weekly routines and adventures in Ghana, Jamaica, US and London, the film creates an emotive account of business and enterprise in the 21st Century through a unique brand of masculinity and brotherhood

programme.title: THE LONG ROAD TO HALL OF FAME
programme.desc: The Long Road To The Hall Of Fame is a feature length documentary about Malik Farrakhan, his life is a parable spanning the last 40 years of African-American history.

programme.title: THE ART OF AMA ATA AIDOO
programme.desc: The Art of Ama Ata Aidoo explores the artistic contribution of one of Africaâ€™s foremost women writers. The film charts Aidooâ€™s creative journey over seven decades and celebrates the acclaimed Pan-African feminist, poet, playwright and novelist and provides a fascinating insight into her life.
